name: In re TRUST AGREEMENT FOR the RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN OF the PITTSBURGH PRESS COMPANY AND PITTSBURGH NEWSPAPER PRINTING PRESSMEN'S UNION NO. 9. Pension Trust Plan of the Daily News Publishing Company and Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen's Union No. 9. Appeal of RETIREMENT BOARD OF the RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN OF the PITTSBURGH PRESS COMPANY AND PITTSBURGH NEWSPAPER PRINTING PRESSMEN'S UNION NO. 9 and the Pension Board of the Pension Trust Plan of the Daily News Publishing Company and the Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen's Union No. 9
name_abbreviation: In re Trust Agreement for the Retirement Benefit Plan of the Pittsburgh Press Co. & Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen's Union No. 9

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re TRUST AGREEMENT FOR the RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN OF the PITTSBURGH PRESS COMPANY AND PITTSBURGH NEWSPAPER PRINTING PRESSMEN’S UNION NO. 9. Pension Trust Plan of the Daily News Publishing Company and Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen’s Union No. 9. Appeal of RETIREMENT BOARD OF the RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN OF the PITTSBURGH PRESS COMPANY AND PITTSBURGH NEWSPAPER PRINTING PRESSMEN’S UNION NO. 9 and the Pension Board of the Pension Trust Plan of the Daily News Publishing Company and the Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen’s Union No. 9.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Half of all the costs are to be paid by the appellants, and half of all the costs are to be paid by the appellee.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: J. Craig Kuhn, Kuhn, Engle & Stein, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
W. Gregg Kerr, Howard D. Schwartz, Margaret P. Joy, Eckert, Seamans, Cheri & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
410 A.2d 775
In re TRUST AGREEMENT FOR the RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN OF the PITTSBURGH PRESS COMPANY AND PITTSBURGH NEWSPAPER PRINTING PRESSMEN’S UNION NO. 9. Pension Trust Plan of the Daily News Publishing Company and Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen’s Union No. 9. Appeal of RETIREMENT BOARD OF the RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN OF the PITTSBURGH PRESS COMPANY AND PITTSBURGH NEWSPAPER PRINTING PRESSMEN’S UNION NO. 9 and the Pension Board of the Pension Trust Plan of the Daily News Publishing Company and the Pittsburgh Newspaper Printing Pressmen’s Union No. 9.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 6, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
J. Craig Kuhn, Kuhn, Engle & Stein, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
W. Gregg Kerr, Howard D. Schwartz, Margaret P. Joy, Eckert, Seamans, Cheri & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
